title: 96 Frames
overview: When Lukas wakes up after a heavy night of partying with no memory, he discovers a video circulating online in which he appears to murder someone. He flees in panic. With the help of Noa, the roommate of his missing girlfriend Ravi, he tries to find out what happened. But is Lukas as innocent as he claims? And why is Noa so keen to help him? Can she be trusted?
